EmailTemplate.name: 8/6/2013 - Storage webinar.Pre-event mailer
EmailTemplate.subject: Looking Forward to Tomorrow’s Webinar: Reduce Storage Infrastructure Costs and Control Your Virtual Environment
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
I look forward to having you join us tomorrow at 11:00AM EDT for the webinar, Reduce Storage Infrastructure Costs and Control Your Virtual Environment. In advance of the session, feel free to contact me <mailto:jonathan.reeve@vmturbo.com> with any questions you’d like addressed. There will also be a live Q&A session following the presentation.
Best Regards
Jonathan Reeve, Director, Product Marketing
